name: Concierge Pilot
summary: Software Engineer with 10+ years leading technical projects end-to-end across Healthcare, Tech, Agencies, and Games. I break down complex backlogs with cross-functional teams and ship production-grade software in Python and JavaScript. I build systems that automate operations, drive revenue, and delight users.
current_focus: Pursuing a Master's in Software Engineering and Artificial Intelligence (Torrens). Building AI-enabled products and automation—full‑stack apps, data pipelines, and chatbots—using Python, TypeScript, GraphQL, and modern DevOps. Open to sponsorship and engineering/TPM leadership roles.

projects.name: Portfolio (MERN/Next.js)
projects.description: Full‑stack portfolio built with Next.js, Node.js, GraphQL, and OpenAI. Features secure auth, dynamic blog/articles, project showcase, and an AI-powered chatbot with rate limiting.
projects.impact: Public, open-source; used to demonstrate engineering capabilities and DX.
